ViewObject.Name: SourcesDocNoLOV
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Tracking' SOURCE, SAMPLE_ORDER_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM XXPWC.PWC_ACCESS_SMPLE_TRCKNG_HDR@DR_OCI PwcAccessSmpleTrckngHdrEO, PWC_ACCES_SMPLE_TRCKNG_RCD_HDR@DR_OCI PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO, PWC_ACCES_SMPLE_TRCKNG_RCD_LNS@DR_OCI PwcAccessSmpleRcdLns, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B@DR_OCI MSIB WHERE PwcAccessSmpleTrckngHdrEO.HEADER_ID = PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcAccessSmpleRcdHdrEO.CHALLAN_ID = PwcAccessSmpleRcdLns.CHALLAN_ID AND MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = PwcAccessSmpleRcdLns.ITEM_ID AND MSIB.organization_id = xxpwc.pwc_organization_name ('Item Master Organization') AND CURRENT_DELIVERY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Tracking' = :pSource AND ACCESSORIES_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Bundle Movement' SOURCE, PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_MFG_CUTISSUANCE@DR_OCI PwcMfgCutissuance, PWC_MFG_CUTISSUANCE_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO WHERE PwcMfgCutissuance.CUTISSUE_ID = LineEO.CUTISSUE_ID AND 'Bundle Movement' = :pSource AND PwcMfgCutissuance.DIVISION_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL@DR_OCI AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE@DR_OCI SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP@DR_OCI ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP@DR_OCI ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP@DR_OCI FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP = ToPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND FromPriDepEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL /* SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_TO_PRI_DEP ToPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ToPriDepEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP = ToPriDepEO.TO_PRI_DEP AND FromPriDepEO.Qty_Send_To_Merch IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL */ SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT@DR_OCI PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT@DR_OCI PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT@DR_OCI PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL /* SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID = PwcOntReqToEmbDeptEO.TO_EMB_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL */ SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE@DR_OCI SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP@DR_OCI ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE@DR_OCI SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP@DR_OCI ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP@DR_OCI ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE@DR_OCI LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS@DR_OCI HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource /*AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId*/ AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL /* SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_TO_WASH_DEP ReqToWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID = ReqToWashingDetailsEO.REQ_DETAIL_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL */ SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND FromPriDepEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_DET_FROM_PRI_DEP FromPriDepEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND FromPriDepEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND FromPriDepEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_EMB_DEPT PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND PwcOntReqFromEmbDeptEO.PRODUCTION_QTY IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND 'Sample Status (LOB-Dispatch)' = :pSource AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.PRODUCTION_UNIT_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_REQ_FROM_WASH_DEP ReqFromWashingDetailsEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.LINE_ID AND ReqFromWashingDetailsEO.Production_Qty IS NOT NULL AND 'Sample Status (Dispatch)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Tracking' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Tracking' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Dye / Wash Receive and Delivery' SOURCE, RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_MFG_DYE_IR_H HEADEREO, PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L_EO WHERE HEADEREO.IR_HEADER_ID = PWC_ISSUE_REC_DYE_DEL_L_EO.IR_HEADER_ID AND 'Dye / Wash Receive and Delivery' = :pSource AND HEADEREO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Move Order' SOURCE, REQUEST_NUMBER SOURCE_DOC_NO from MTL_TXN_REQUEST_HEADERS MTRH, MTL_MATERIAL_TRANSACTIONS MMT where MMT.TRANSACTION_SOURCE_ID = MTRH.HEADER_ID AND MMT.TRANSACTION_SOURCE_TYPE_ID = 4 AND EXISTS (SELECT OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD, HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU WHERE 1=1 AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID = :pOrgId AND MMT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID ) AND 'Move Order' = :pSource UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Inter Orgs' SOURCE, TO_CHAR(TRANSFER_TRANSACTION_ID) SOURCE_DOC_NO from MTL_MATERIAL_TRANSACTIONS MMT WHERE MMT.TRANSACTION_ACTION_ID IN (3,21) AND EXISTS (SELECT OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD, HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU WHERE 1=1 AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID = :pOrgId AND MMT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OOD.ORGANIZATION_ID ) AND 'Inter Orgs' = :pSource UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sample Tracking' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Sample Tracking' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL /*SELECT DISTINCT 'Move Orders / Inter-Orgs' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Move Orders / Inter-Orgs' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL*/ SELECT DISTINCT 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Spreading Table Status (Sending)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' SOURCE, HederEO.PROVISIONAL_SAMPLE_CODE SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ONT_SAM_STAT_AWP_DETAIL AWBEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS_LINE LineEO, PWC_ONT_SAMPLE_STATUS HederEO WHERE LineEO.LINE_ID = AWBEO.LINE_ID AND HederEO.HEADER_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Spreading Table Status (Receiving)' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Sales Order Dispatches' SOURCE, WDD.SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM WSH_DELIVERY_DETAILS WDD, WSH_DELIVERY_ASSIGNMENTS WDA, WSH_NEW_DELIVERIES WND, MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSIB WHERE 1 = 1 AND WDA.DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID = WDD.DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID AND MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = WDD.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID = XXPWC.PWC_ORGANIZATION_NAME ('Item Master Organization') AND WND.DELIVERY_ID = WDA.DELIVERY_ID AND WND.STATUS_CODE = 'CL' AND 'Sales Order Dispatches' = :pSource AND WDD.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Issue / Receive Garments - Issue' SOURCE, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L_H LineHeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.HEADER_ID AND LineHeaderEO.LINE_ID = LineEO.HEADER_ID AND 'Issue / Receive Garments - Issue' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Issue / Receive Garments - Receive' SOURCE, HeaderEO.RECEIVE_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_H HeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_L_H LineHeaderEO, PWC_MFG_ISSUE_REC_WASH_D LineEO WHERE HeaderEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.HEADER_ID AND LineEO.HEADER_ID = LineHeaderEO.LINE_ID AND 'Issue / Receive Garments - Receive' = :pSource AND HeaderEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'Accessories Movement' SOURCE, HederEO.DOCUMENT_NO SOURCE_DOC_NO FROM PWC_ACCESSORIES_MOVEMENT_HDR HederEO WHERE 1=1 AND 'Accessories Movement' = :pSource AND HederEO.ORG_ID = :pOrgId
